Package net.finmath.modelling

Interface SingleAssetProductDescriptor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ProductDescriptor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SingleAssetDigitalOptionProductDescriptor, SingleAssetEuropeanOptionProductDescriptor
    public interface SingleAssetProductDescriptor
extends ProductDescriptor
    Interface for a product descriptor. For a description of the general concept see http://finmath.net/finmath-lib/concepts/separationofproductandmodel.

    1.0
    Author:
    Christian Fries
